<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"check_tx"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/check_tx"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Checks the transaction without executing it. The transaction won't be added to the mempool.

Please refer to [formatting/encoding rules](https://docs.cometbft.com/v0.38.x/core/using-cometbft.html#formatting)
for additional details

Upon success, the `Cache-Control` header will be set with the default
maximum age.

  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

  parameters={[{"in":"query","name":"tx","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string","example":"785"},"description":"The transaction"}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

  label={undefined}

>
